tv.amwa.maj.industry

Class MemoryResidentStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • tv.amwa.maj.industry.MemoryResidentStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Stream

    public class MemoryResidentStream
extends Object
implements Stream, Cloneable

    Implementation of a stream as memory-resident byte buffer.

      • read

        public ByteBuffer read(int bytes)
                throws EndOfDataException,
                       IOException,
                       IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Stream

        Read the number of bytes requested from the stream into a newly created byte buffer.

        Specified by:
        read in interface Stream
        Parameters:
        bytes - Number of bytes to read.
        Returns:
        Byte buffer containing the requested number of bytes read from the stream.
        Throws:
        EndOfDataException - Attempt to read beyond the limit set for the stream.
        IOException - An IO problem occurred when trying to read from the stream.
        IllegalArgumentException - Cannot read a negative number of bytes.
        See Also:
        Stream.write(ByteBuffer), Stream.getLimit(), Stream.getPosition()

        Description copied from interface: Stream

        Specified by:
        setPosition in interface Stream
        Parameters:
        position - Current position for reading from or writing to the stream.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Cannot set a stream position to a negative value or beyond the limit set for the stream.
        IOException - An IO problem occurred when trying to access the stream.
        See Also:
        Stream.getPosition(), Stream.getLimit()

      • write

        public int write(ByteBuffer bytes)
          throws EndOfDataException,
                 IOException
        Description copied from interface: Stream

        Write the number of bytes requested to the stream from the given byte buffer.

        Specified by:
        write in interface Stream
        Parameters:
        bytes - Buffer of data to write. Data is written from the current position to the limit set for the given buffer.
        Returns:
        Number of bytes actually written.
        Throws:
        EndOfDataException - Attempt to write beyond the limit set for the stream.
        IOException - An IO problem occurred when trying to write to the stream.
        See Also:
        Stream.read(int), Stream.getPosition(), Stream.getLimit()

      • getStreamURI

        public URI getStreamURI()
        Description copied from interface: Stream

        Returns the URI that specifies the location of this stream. The URI can be used to resolve the stream and includes just enough information that the stream can be opened and read or written. For example, an AAF stream contains the structured storage path within the file where the stream can be accessed, whereas an MXF stream contains the body and index stream identifiers.

        Specified by:
        getStreamURI in interface Stream
        Returns:
        URI that specifies the location of the stream.
        See Also:
        StreamResolver

        Returns:
